p: The CXE vetiver oil presented an approximately similar antioxidant activity as traditional oil. Based on the other references [ 35], the presence of Î²-vetivenene can justify the slight ability of IVD oil (0.73%) and the strong antioxidant activity of HD oil (3.89%). The essential oil obtained by the SFE method has weak antioxidant activity because of its poor chemical composition, which was predominantly composed of hydrocarbons [ 34].
